messages.message: Enable log-in with Google+. Required a value for the following fields. The PHP extension CURL must be enabled on the server.

You will get this information when you register your website on Google+. Click on "API Access", then "Create an OAuth 2.0 client ID". At "Redirect URIs", provide the full URL of pattern http://www.mydomain.com/websoccerfolder/?page=home&action=googleplus-login.
Will be provided after website registration on Google+ as well.
Will be provided after website registration on Google+ as well. Will be shown as "API key" below "Simple API Access".
